00054 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmeditselseq_active_doc,
00055 "The last selected element or None (read-only).\n\n:type: :class:`BMVert`, :class:`BMEdge` or :class:`BMFace`"
00056 );
00057 static PyObject *bpy_bmeditselseq_active_get(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self, void *UNUSED(closure))
00058 {
00059     BMEditSelection *ese;
00060     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00061 
00062     if ((ese = self->bm->selected.last)) {
00063         return BPy_BMElem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, &ese->ele->head);
00064     }
00065     else {
00066         Py_RETURN_NONE;
00067     }
00068 }

00072     {NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL} /* Sentinel */
00073 };

00099 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmeditselseq_add_doc,
00100 ".. method:: add(element)\n"
00101 "\n"
00102 "   Add an element to the selection history (no action taken if its already added).\n"
00103 );
00104 static PyObject *bpy_bmeditselseq_add(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self, BPy_BMElem *value)
00105 {
00106     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00107 
00108     if ((BPy_BMVert_Check(value) ||
00109          BPy_BMEdge_Check(value) ||
00110          BPy_BMFace_Check(value)) == FALSE)
00111     {
00112         PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError,
00113                      "Expected a BMVert/BMedge/BMFace not a %.200s", Py_TYPE(value)->tp_name);
00114         return NULL;
00115     }
00116 
00117     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(value);
00118 
00119     if (self->bm != value->bm) {
00120         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,
00121                         "Element is not from this mesh");
00122         return NULL;
00123     }
00124 
00125     BM_select_history_store(self->bm, value->ele);
00126 
00127     Py_RETURN_NONE;
00128 }
00129 
00130 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmeditselseq_remove_doc,
00131 ".. method:: remove(element)\n"
00132 "\n"
00133 "   Remove an element from the selection history.\n"
00134 );
00135 static PyObject *bpy_bmeditselseq_remove(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self, BPy_BMElem *value)
00136 {
00137     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00138 
00139     if ((BPy_BMVert_Check(value) ||
00140          BPy_BMEdge_Check(value) ||
00141          BPy_BMFace_Check(value)) == FALSE)
00142     {
00143         PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError,
00144                      "Expected a BMVert/BMedge/BMFace not a %.200s", Py_TYPE(value)->tp_name);
00145         return NULL;
00146     }
00147 
00148     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(value);
00149 
00150     if ((self->bm != value->bm) ||
00151         (BM_select_history_remove(self->bm, value->ele) == FALSE))
00152     {
00153         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,
00154                         "Element not found in selection history");
00155         return NULL;
00156     }
00157 
00158     Py_RETURN_NONE;
00159 }

00166     {"remove",   (PyCFunction)bpy_bmeditselseq_remove,   METH_O,      bpy_bmeditselseq_remove_doc},
00167     {NULL, NULL, 0, NULL}

00174 static Py_ssize_t bpy_bmeditselseq_length(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self)
00175 {
00176     BPY_BM_CHECK_INT(self);
00177 
00178     return BLI_countlist(&self->bm->selected);
00179 }
00180 
00181 static PyObject *bpy_bmeditselseq_subscript_int(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self, int keynum)
00182 {
00183     BMEditSelection *ese;
00184 
00185     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00186 
00187     if (keynum < 0) {
00188         ese = BLI_rfindlink(&self->bm->selected, -1 - keynum);
00189     }
00190     else {
00191         ese = BLI_findlink(&self->bm->selected, keynum);
00192     }
00193 
00194     if (ese) {
00195         return BPy_BMElem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, &ese->ele->head);
00196     }
00197     else {
00198         PyErr_Format(PyExc_IndexError,
00199                      "BMElemSeq[index]: index %d out of range", keynum);
00200         return NULL;
00201     }
00202 }
00203 
00204 static PyObject *bpy_bmeditselseq_subscript_slice(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self, Py_ssize_t start, Py_ssize_t stop)
00205 {
00206     int count = 0;
00207     int ok;
00208 
00209     PyObject *list;
00210     PyObject *item;
00211     BMEditSelection *ese;
00212 
00213     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00214 
00215     list = PyList_New(0);
00216 
00217     ese = self->bm->selected.first;
00218 
00219     ok = (ese != NULL);
00220 
00221     if (UNLIKELY(ok == FALSE)) {
00222         return list;
00223     }
00224 
00225     /* first loop up-until the start */
00226     for (ok = TRUE; ok; ok = ((ese = ese->next) != NULL)) {
00227         if (count == start) {
00228             break;
00229         }
00230         count++;
00231     }
00232 
00233     /* add items until stop */
00234     while ((ese = ese->next)) {
00235         item = BPy_BMElem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, &ese->ele->head);
00236         PyList_Append(list, item);
00237         Py_DECREF(item);
00238 
00239         count++;
00240         if (count == stop) {
00241             break;
00242         }
00243     }
00244 
00245     return list;
00246 }
00247 
00248 static PyObject *bpy_bmeditselseq_subscript(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self, PyObject *key)
00249 {
00250     /* don't need error check here */
00251     if (PyIndex_Check(key)) {
00252         Py_ssize_t i = PyNumber_AsSsize_t(key, PyExc_IndexError);
00253         if (i == -1 && PyErr_Occurred())
00254             return NULL;
00255         return bpy_bmeditselseq_subscript_int(self, i);
00256     }
00257     else if (PySlice_Check(key)) {
00258         PySliceObject *key_slice = (PySliceObject *)key;
00259         Py_ssize_t step = 1;
00260 
00261         if (key_slice->step != Py_None && !_PyEval_SliceIndex(key, &step)) {
00262             return NULL;
00263         }
00264         else if (step != 1) {
00265             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError,
00266                             "BMElemSeq[slice]: slice steps not supported");
00267             return NULL;
00268         }
00269         else if (key_slice->start == Py_None && key_slice->stop == Py_None) {
00270             return bpy_bmeditselseq_subscript_slice(self, 0, PY_SSIZE_T_MAX);
00271         }
00272         else {
00273             Py_ssize_t start = 0, stop = PY_SSIZE_T_MAX;
00274 
00275             /* avoid PySlice_GetIndicesEx because it needs to know the length ahead of time. */
00276             if (key_slice->start != Py_None && !_PyEval_SliceIndex(key_slice->start, &start)) return NULL;
00277             if (key_slice->stop != Py_None && !_PyEval_SliceIndex(key_slice->stop, &stop))    return NULL;
00278 
00279             if (start < 0 || stop < 0) {
00280                 /* only get the length for negative values */
00281                 Py_ssize_t len = bpy_bmeditselseq_length(self);
00282                 if (start < 0) start += len;
00283                 if (stop < 0) start += len;
00284             }
00285 
00286             if (stop - start <= 0) {
00287                 return PyList_New(0);
00288             }
00289             else {
00290                 return bpy_bmeditselseq_subscript_slice(self, start, stop);
00291             }
00292         }
00293     }
00294     else {
00295         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_AttributeError,
00296                         "BMElemSeq[key]: invalid key, key must be an int");
00297         return NULL;
00298     }
00299 }
00300 
00301 static int bpy_bmeditselseq_contains(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self, PyObject *value)
00302 {
00303     BPy_BMElem *value_bm_ele;
00304 
00305     BPY_BM_CHECK_INT(self);
00306 
00307     value_bm_ele = (BPy_BMElem *)value;
00308     if (value_bm_ele->bm == self->bm) {
00309         return BM_select_history_check(self->bm, value_bm_ele->ele);
00310     }
00311 
00312     return 0;
00313 }

00338 static PyObject *bpy_bmeditselseq_iter(BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self)
00339 {
00340     BPy_BMEditSelIter *py_iter;
00341 
00342     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00343     py_iter = (BPy_BMEditSelIter *)BPy_BMEditSelIter_CreatePyObject(self->bm);
00344     py_iter->ese = self->bm->selected.first;
00345     return (PyObject *)py_iter;
00346 }
00347 
00348 static PyObject *bpy_bmeditseliter_next(BPy_BMEditSelIter *self)
00349 {
00350     BMEditSelection *ese = self->ese;
00351     if (ese == NULL) {
00352         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_StopIteration,
00353                         "bpy_bmiter_next stop");
00354         return NULL;
00355     }
00356     else {
00357         self->ese = ese->next;
00358         return (PyObject *)BPy_BMElem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, &ese->ele->head);
00359     }
00360 }

00366 PyObject *BPy_BMEditSel_CreatePyObject(BMesh *bm)
00367 {
00368     BPy_BMEditSelSeq *self = PyObject_New(BPy_BMEditSelSeq, &BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type);
00369     self->bm = bm;
00370     /* caller must initialize 'iter' member */
00371     return (PyObject *)self;
00372 }

00377     self->bm = bm;
00378     /* caller must initialize 'iter' member */
00379     return (PyObject *)self;

00382 void BPy_BM_init_types_select(void)
00383 {
00384     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_basicsize     = sizeof(BPy_BMEditSelSeq);
00385     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_basicsize    = sizeof(BPy_BMEditSelIter);
00386 
00387     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_name  = "BMEditSelSeq";
00388     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_name = "BMEditSelIter";
00389 
00390     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_doc   = NULL; // todo
00391     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_doc  = NULL;
00392 
00393     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_repr  = (reprfunc)NULL;
00394     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_repr = (reprfunc)NULL;
00395 
00396     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_getset     = bpy_bmeditselseq_getseters;
00397     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_getset = NULL;
00398 
00399     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_methods     = bpy_bmeditselseq_methods;
00400     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_methods = NULL;
00401 
00402     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_as_sequence = &bpy_bmeditselseq_as_sequence;
00403 
00404     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_as_mapping = &bpy_bmeditselseq_as_mapping;
00405 
00406     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_iter = (getiterfunc)bpy_bmeditselseq_iter;
00407 
00408     /* only 1 iteratir so far */
00409     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_iternext = (iternextfunc)bpy_bmeditseliter_next;
00410 
00411     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_dealloc     = NULL; //(destructor)bpy_bmeditselseq_dealloc;
00412     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_dealloc = NULL; //(destructor)bpy_bmvert_dealloc;
00413 
00414     BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type.tp_flags     = Py_TPFLAGS_DEFAULT;
00415     BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type.tp_flags    = Py_TPFLAGS_DEFAULT;
00416 
00417     PyType_Ready(&BPy_BMEditSelSeq_Type);
00418     PyType_Ready(&BPy_BMEditSelIter_Type);
00419 }

00422 /* utility function */
00423 
00427 int BPy_BMEditSel_Assign(BPy_BMesh *self, PyObject *value)
00428 {
00429     BMesh *bm;
00430     Py_ssize_t value_len;
00431     Py_ssize_t i;
00432     BMElem **value_array = NULL;
00433 
00434     BPY_BM_CHECK_INT(self);
00435 
00436     bm = self->bm;
00437 
00438     value_array = BPy_BMElem_PySeq_As_Array(&bm, value, 0, PY_SSIZE_T_MAX,
00439                                             &value_len, BM_VERT | BM_EDGE | BM_FACE,
00440                                             TRUE, TRUE, "BMesh.select_history = value");
00441 
00442     if (value_array == NULL) {
00443         return -1;
00444     }
00445 
00446     BM_select_history_clear(bm);
00447 
00448     for (i = 0; i < value_len; i++) {
00449         BM_select_history_store_notest(bm, value_array[i]);
00450     }
00451 
00452     PyMem_FREE(value_array);
00453     return 0;
00454 }
